name: TechShop Google Calendar
tagline: Live updating Google Calendar feed of my local TechShop's open classes
body:
### What do you want to learn?

You can go to this page [here](http://www.techshop.ws/take_classes.html?storeId=5) and drill down into what you want to learn and then figure out when there are open classes

[]()
### I want to learn everything!

Or if you just want to see at a glance *all the things* that you could be learning you can do this:

Log in to your Google Calendar account
[]()

Add a calendar by URL
[]()

Paste this URL
[]()

### But I don't live near the San Jose location!

Well, you can always deploy this yourself, for your own TechShop location
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
